title: Glacial Lake Outburst Floods
description: One-minute skill: Glacial Lake Outburst Floods.

hook.text: Melting glaciers create lakes held back by walls of ice and rubble. When the wall breaks, disaster follows.

buildup.text: As glaciers retreat, meltwater pools behind natural dams made of loose rock and ice.

twist.text: Nepal has over 2,000 glacial lakes. At least 21 are classified as dangerous and growing.

climax.text: Climate change is accelerating glacier melt. Every year, more lakes form and more dams weaken.
